allow: Bash(then echo 'File: $(basename $f)' jq -s "[.[] | select(.message.model)] | group_by(.message.model) | map({model: .[0].message.model, count: length})" $f)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Release v0.1.0: Enhanced Trip Computer analytics for /session-stats

Added comprehensive session analytics with actionable insights:
- Rate & Trajectory: cost per message/tool, projected spending
- Efficiency Metrics: cache efficiency, cost savings, output/input ratio
- Session Insights: model mix, context growth, smart recommendations
- Cost Drivers: percentage breakdown of what''s driving costs
- Enhanced Display: beautiful bordered sections with visual hierarchy

Updated all documentation and installation guides for v0.1.0.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
